allow:
Bash(git commit -m "feat: Add support for ''by'' keyword in do loops and ''neq'' operator

Features:
- Added BY token type for step size in do-from-to loops
- Added ''neq'' as alias for ''ne'' operator
- Parser now handles ''by'' clause: do !i from 1 to 10 by 2

Changes:
- tokens.ts: Added BY token and keyword mappings for ''by'' and ''neq''
- nodes.ts: Added ''by'' field to DoStatement AST node
- parser.ts: parseDoStatement() now parses optional ''by'' clause

Example:
  do !indxA from !depth to !pDepth by -1
      -- code here
  enddo")
